Posts.EditableText: Hi, this probably sounds stupid (I'm fairly new to all of this), but I'm having some Language-difficulties. I've set my Language to English, but it keeps autocorrecting it to Norwegian (my mother-language) It's really annoying when I'm trying to do a text-based game, and no other websites does this... Can someone please help me? ><
Posts.HTML: Hi, this probably sounds stupid (I'm fairly new to all of this), but I'm having some Language-difficulties. I've set my Language to English, but it keeps autocorrecting it to Norwegian (my mother-language) It's really annoying when I'm trying to do a text-based game, and no other websites does this... Can someone please help me? ><

Posts.EditableText: I would guess you are using the web version, and that it is the browser doing that, not Quest. check the settings in your browser (or perhaps use another browser, so one is set for English and one for Norwegian).
Posts.HTML: I would guess you are using the web version, and that it is the browser doing that, not Quest. check the settings in your browser (or perhaps use another browser, so one is set for English and one for Norwegian).

Posts.EditableText: I went in and changed the entirety of my browser/settings, and it works! Thank you so much!
Posts.HTML: I went in and changed the entirety of my browser/settings, and it works! Thank you so much!
